      void test_getNextFallbackLocale_being_fed_language_only_locale()
      Test case of providing language-only locale but not identical to ultimate fall-back locale to LanguagePolicyLocaleFallbackHandler.getNextFallbackLocale(Locale) method.
      void test_getNextFallbackLocale_being_fed_LanguageCountry_locale()
      Test case of providing language+country locale but not identical to ultimate fall-back locale to LanguagePolicyLocaleFallbackHandler.getNextFallbackLocale(Locale) method.
      Regarding locale list configuration, it holds locales with same language except language-only locale, and the order of locales in it is not fall-back order.
      void test_getNextFallbackLocale_being_fed_LanguageCountryScript_locale()
      Test case of providing language+country+script locale but not identical to ultimate fall-back locale to LanguagePolicyLocaleFallbackHandler.getNextFallbackLocale(Locale) method.
      Regarding locale list configuration, it holds only language+country+script+variant locale for same language.
      void test_getNextFallbackLocale_being_fed_ultimate_fallback_locale()
      Test case of providing ultimate fall-back locale to LanguagePolicyLocaleFallbackHandler.getNextFallbackLocale(Locale) method.

      Test case for LanguagePolicyLocaleFallbackHandler.getNextFallbackLocale(Locale) method when locale with script is given as argument.

    • Method Detail

      • test_Locale_getters

        public void test_Locale_getters()
                         throws Throwable
        Test whether Locale, of what getter method for member field returns null, exists.
        If such Locale object can exist, then implemented logic inside of LanguagePolicyLocaleFallbackHandler.isUltimateLocale(Locale) method needs to be modified.
        Throws:
        Throwable

      • getScriptWithMultiLocales

        public Map<String,List<Locale>> getScriptWithMultiLocales()
        Returns:
        Map for scripts what have been used with multiple locales.
        ex. [sr_ME_#Latn, sr_BA_#Latn, sr__#Latn, sr_RS_#Latn]
        The key is script string and the value will be the list of locales. The returned map will not contain script what has been used only with single locale.

      • getLanguageWithMultiLocales

        public Map<String,List<Locale>> getLanguageWithMultiLocales()
        Returns:
        Map for languages what have been used with multiple locales.
        The key is language string and the value will be the list of locales. The returned map will not contain language what has been used only with language-only locale.

      • getVariantLocales

        public Map<String,List<Locale>> getVariantLocales()
        Returns:
        Map for variant of locales.
        The key is variant string and the value will be the list of locales.

        public void test_setUltimateLocale()

        public void test_getNextFallbackLocale_for_no_same_language_locale_in_locale_list_case()
        Test case of providing locale, of what language won't be found in fall-back locale list, to LanguagePolicyLocaleFallbackHandler.getNextFallbackLocale(Locale) method.

      • test_getNextFallbackLocale_being_fed_ultimate_fallback_locale

        public void test_getNextFallbackLocale_being_fed_ultimate_fallback_locale()
        Test case of providing ultimate fall-back locale to LanguagePolicyLocaleFallbackHandler.getNextFallbackLocale(Locale) method.

      • test_getNextFallbackLocale_being_fed_language_only_locale

        public void test_getNextFallbackLocale_being_fed_language_only_locale()
        Test case of providing language-only locale but not identical to ultimate fall-back locale to LanguagePolicyLocaleFallbackHandler.getNextFallbackLocale(Locale) method.

      • test_getNextFallbackLocale_being_fed_LanguageCountry_locale

        public void test_getNextFallbackLocale_being_fed_LanguageCountry_locale()
        Test case of providing language+country locale but not identical to ultimate fall-back locale to LanguagePolicyLocaleFallbackHandler.getNextFallbackLocale(Locale) method.
        Regarding locale list configuration, it holds locales with same language except language-only locale, and the order of locales in it is not fall-back order.
        Test confirms whether ultimate fall-back locale is returned by LanguagePolicyLocaleFallbackHandler.getNextFallbackLocale(Locale) method.

      • test_getNextFallbackLocale_being_fed_LanguageCountryScript_locale

        public void test_getNextFallbackLocale_being_fed_LanguageCountryScript_locale()
        Test case of providing language+country+script locale but not identical to ultimate fall-back locale to LanguagePolicyLocaleFallbackHandler.getNextFallbackLocale(Locale) method.
        Regarding locale list configuration, it holds only language+country+script+variant locale for same language.
        Test confirms whether ultimate fall-back locale is returned by LanguagePolicyLocaleFallbackHandler.getNextFallbackLocale(Locale) method.

      • test_getNextFallbackLocale_with_LanguageCountry_ultimate_fallback_locale

        public void test_getNextFallbackLocale_with_LanguageCountry_ultimate_fallback_locale()
        Test case for LanguagePolicyLocaleFallbackHandler.getNextFallbackLocale(Locale) method when language+country locale has been set as ultimate fall-back locale.
        Test confirms whether ultimate fall-back locale is returned by LanguagePolicyLocaleFallbackHandler.getNextFallbackLocale(Locale) method.

      • test_getNextFallbackLocale_with_LanguageCountryScript_ultimate_fallback_locale

        public void test_getNextFallbackLocale_with_LanguageCountryScript_ultimate_fallback_locale()

        public void test_getNextFallbackLocale_with_LanguageCountryScriptVariant_locale()

        public void test_getNextFallbackLocale_with_LanguageCountryScript_locale()
